entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. Your call is important to us. Please hold for the next available representative.
Ugh, finally! I've been on hold forever. I need to return something.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, my name is Alex, how can I help you today?
I want to return a VeloBand Pulse. I bought it a couple of weeks ago and it's just not working out for me.
Okay, I understand. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Thank you. Let me pull that up. Okay, I see your order for the VeloBand Pulse placed 15 days ago. Can you tell me what issues you're experiencing?
I don't need to tell you why, I just want to return it. It's not what I expected, and I want my money back. This is ridiculous. I waited so long on hold for this?
I understand your frustration. At VeloFit, we want you to be completely satisfied. Our return policy allows for returns within 90 days of purchase, so you're well within that window.
90 days? Really? Okay, well that's good to know. So, how do I proceed with the return?

Yes, absolutely. To start the return process, I will email you a prepaid shipping label. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse securely in its original packaging, if possible, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process your refund. You should see the refund credited back to your account within 7-10 business days. As a point of reference, it's different from returning a smart watch, which may need additional protection.
Okay, that sounds easy enough. So I don't need to speak to a manager or anything?

No, that won't be necessary at all. I am authorized to handle your return. No need to speak to my manager. You'll receive the email with the return label within the next few minutes. Just remember that if you are looking at other options, the special 10 days only applies to digital purchases, it doesn't affect the VeloBand Pulse.
Perfect! Thank you so much! I appreciate your help. I was expecting a huge hassle, but you made it really easy.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Great! Have a wonderful day and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
